channel.title: Converting a batch file to a .SH file
channel.description:
[code] @echo off
:main title Server cls set java="%jpath%\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp . server goto main [/code]
Can someone help me transfer this to a .sh file
i got lost at the !bin/bash crap lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2008, 09:29:28 AM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Converting a batch file to a .SH file
item.dc:creator: @pwnm30rdi3 pwnm30rdi3
item.description:
@pwnm30rdi3 wrote:

@echo off

:main
  title Server
  cls
  set java="%jpath%\bin\java.exe"
  java -Xmx1024m -cp . server
  goto main

Can someone help me transfer this to a .sh file

i got lost at the !bin/bash crap lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2008, 09:29:28 AM[/size][hr]anyone?

Read full topic
